name: evil-parrot-13

original.html:
<button class="button">
  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1.25rem" height="1.25rem" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2">
    <path d="M12 19v-7m0 0V5m0 7H5m7 0h7"></path>
  </svg>
  Create
</button>

    <path d="M12 19v-7m0 0V5m0 7H5m7 0h7"></path>
